content: Shopping center in Orchard Road, SingaporeThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Forum The Shopping Mall" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(July 2024)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Forum The Shopping Mall** ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese): 福临购物中心, [Tamil](/wiki/Tamil_language): பாரம் அங்காடி ) is a [shopping mall](/wiki/Shopping_mall) on Singapore's main shopping belt, [Orchard Road](/wiki/Orchard_Road). It was built on the site of the Singapura Forum Hotel. It is owned by Hotel Properties Limited (HPL). Located along the upper stretch of Orchard Road and a five-minute walk from [Orchard](/wiki/Orchard_MRT_station) MRT station, the mall is anchored by [Toys "R" Us](/wiki/Toys_%22R%22_Us) and Julia Gabriel Centre. ## History In 2023, its parent company, HPL, obtained approval from [Urban Redevelopment Authority](/wiki/Urban_Redevelopment_Authority) to redevelop Forum The Shopping Mall, voco Orchard Singapore and HPL House into a mixed-use redevelopment. - [List of shopping malls in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_shopping_malls_in_Singapore) - Official website This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Forum The Shopping Mall
